Compute concordance and robustness metrics for AlertSystem

dot-compute_alert_metrics.Rd

For each group × pathway (logFC column) this computes:

  • effect : mean or median logFC (matching fun)

  • concordance : fraction of cells whose logFC sign matches the group effect sign

  • robust_gt_thresh : fraction of cells whose logFC is both: (i) above the magnitude threshold (|logFC| ≥ robust_effect_thresh) and (ii) has the same sign as the group-level effect.

Usage

.compute_alert_metrics(
  seurat_obj,
  score_pattern = "_logFC$",
  group.by = NULL,
  fun = c("mean", "median"),
  compute_concordance = TRUE,
  compute_robustness = TRUE,
  robust_effect_thresh = 0,
  base_tag = NULL,
  pert_tag = NULL
)

Details

This replaces the previous bootstrap-based credibility metric, which tended to saturate at 0/1 for large cell numbers. Robustness is now defined directly from the per-cell logFC distribution.
